messages.content: I am building apartment building with 5 flats in Linz. How many square meters of playground do I have to plan?

For your apartment building with 5 flats in Linz, you are required to plan a playground area of **150 m²**. This includes a minimum of **100 m²** plus **10 m²** for each apartment. Specifically, the calculation is as follows: \[ 100 \, \text{m}^2 + (5 \times 10 \, \text{m}^2) = 150 \, \text{m}^2 \]. Additionally, at least **75 m²** of this playground area must be designed as green space. The playground must be located within **200 meters** of the apartments to ensure safe and convenient access. Furthermore, it is essential to maintain the playground in accordance with safety and health regulations, which includes regular cleaning and replacing materials like sand at least once a year. These requirements are outlined in the Upper Austria Building Code (Bauordnung 1994) and the Building Technology Law (Bautechnikgesetz 2013).
